home.title: Authentic Yemeni Taste
home.subtitle: In Yemen Gate, We offer authentic Yemeni food and adhere to health and quality standards in the selection of ingredients and in the method of preparation. Our kitchen is distinguished by its flavor, freshness and special spices. Traditional dishes are our signature, our hospitality and gratitude are our nature.

slider.slide_1_title: Healthy Yemeni Cuisine: A Delicious Journey to Wellness
slider.slide_1_subtitle: Experience the fusion of nutritious ingredients and authentic Yemeni flavors at Yemen Gate. Our menu is designed to cater to health-conscious individuals without compromising on taste.
slider.slide_2_title: Authentic Yemeni Cuisine: A Taste of Tradition
slider.slide_2_subtitle: Yemen Gate is your gateway to Yemeni culture and history through its authentic culinary heritage. We honor tradition with every dish, using locally sourced ingredients and time-honored techniques.
slider.slide_3_title: Rich Flavor: Yemeni Cuisine's Culinary Symphony
slider.slide_3_subtitle: Savor a symphony of bold, rich flavors at Yemen Gate. Our chefs are culinary maestros, creating dishes that are a vibrant celebration of Yemeni cuisine's renowned taste and complexity.

lamb_mandi.title: Lamb Mandi
lamb_mandi.description: Consists of lamb and rice. Blended with Yemeni Spices, topped with onions, almonds, raisins. Served with hot sauce (sahawiq)

chicken_mandi.title: Chicken Mandi
chicken_mandi.description: Consists of chicken and rice. Blended with Yemeni Spices, topped with onions, almonds, raisins. Served with hot sauce (sahawiq)

chicken_mazbi.title: Chicken Mazbi
chicken_mazbi.description: Consists of stone-grilled chicken served with rice and hot sauce (sahawiq)

lamb_haneeth.title: Slow Roasted Lamb (Haneeth)
lamb_haneeth.description: Consists of steam-cooked Basmati Rice with Slow Roasted Lamb. Infused with secret spices, topped with a mixer of almonds, raisins and onion. Served with Yemeni hot sauce (sahawiq)

family_mix_mandi.title: Family Mix Mandi
family_mix_mandi.description: Consists of meat and chicken, and rice. Blended with Yemeni Spices, topped with onions, almonds, raisins. Served with hot sauce (sahawiq)

family_mandi_lamb.title: Family Mandi Lamb
family_mandi_lamb.description: Consists of Lamb and rice. Blended with Yemeni Spices, topped with onions, almond, raisins. Served with hot sauce (sahawiq)

vege_motabaq.title: Arabian Quesadilla Vegetables (Murtabak)
vege_motabaq.description: Consists of folded bread with bits of vegetables and eggs. Served with lemon and green pepper

fahsa.title: Fahsa
fahsa.description: Consists of pieces of meat, garlic, tomatoes, cumin and other spices

salta.title: Salta
salta.description: Consists of fenugreek, broth, meat and spices

lamb_pot.title: Lamb Pot
lamb_pot.description: Consists of meat with various vegetables and spices

qilabat_meat.title: Qilabat Meat
qilabat_meat.description: Consists of cubed and roasted meat, cooked with oil, pepper, and garlic, enhanced with special spices

liver.title: Liver
liver.description: Consists of fried liver with oil, onions. garlic, pepper and spices to give a delicious taste

dry_pot_beans.title: Dry/Pot beans
dry_pot_beans.description: Consists of beans, minced meat, and special spices for this delicious dish

beans_mudara.title: Beans Mudara
beans_mudara.description: Consists of beans with tomatoes. coriander and cumin

shakshouka.title: Shakshouka
shakshouka.description: Consists of mixture of vegetables, onions, tomatoes, peppers and spices, in addition to eggs

yemeni_foul.title: Yemeni Foul
yemeni_foul.description: Consists of fava beans with tahini, in addition to vegetables, tomatoes and garlic

tuna_with_peas.title: Arabian Quesadilla Vegetables (Murtabak)
tuna_with_peas.description: Consists of tuna and peas, in addition to tomato paste. corn and carrots

maraq.title: Lamb Broth
maraq.description: Cooked with the Yemeni traditional spices

oat_soup.title: Oat Soup
oat_soup.description: Consists of a spiced light tomato broth, with cooked oats in it

cucumber_yogurt_salad.title: Cucumber yogurt salad
cucumber_yogurt_salad.description: Consists of mixed sliced cucumbers and spices with yogurt

tabeekh.title: Vegetable Mix Stew
tabeekh.description: Consists of stewed vegetables, potatoes, carrots, and eggplant simmered in tomato gravy packed with nutrients

lentil_soup.title: Lentil Soup
lentil_soup.description: Consists of roasted lentils with onions, broth, spices, coriander and parsley

okra_soup.title: Okra Soup
okra_soup.description: Consists of okra, spices and herbs like onions, garlic, and cumin

mulukhiyah_soup.title: Mulukhiyah Soup
mulukhiyah_soup.description: Consists of soft mallow leaves with broth, and garlic

tabbouleh.title: Tabbouleh
tabbouleh.description: Consists of fine bulgur, Darsie, onions, cucumbers, lemons, tomatoes, mint and olive oil

fattoush.title: Fattoush
fattoush.description: Consists of pieces of toasted bread with a homogeneous mixture of vegetables, tomatoes, cucumbers, radishes, and lettuce

hummus.title: Hummus
hummus.description: Consists of chickpeas, tahini, lemon, garlic and hot pepper

maasoub.title: Ma'asoub
maasoub.description: Consists of a banana-based dessert made from over-ripe bananas, ground flatbread, and cream, topped with honey

date_fattah.title: Date Fattah
date_fattah.description: Dates mixed with flour, butter, vegetable oil, and black seeds

adani_tea.title: Adani Tea
adani_tea.description: Black Tea with Milk. Made with Yemeni Spices

espresso_coffee.title: Espresso Coffee
espresso_coffee.description: Roasted coffee beans dissolved and concentrated with boiling water

black_coffee.title: Black Coffee
black_coffee.description: Roasted and ground coffee beans dissolve in water

earayiysi.title: earayiysi
earayiysi.description: A mixture or mango, apple, banana, date paste concentrated milk and halva

ayran.title: Ayran
ayran.description: A cold savory yogurt-based beverage of yogurt and water

mandi_rice.title: Mandi Rice
mandi_rice.description: Mandi rice, topped with onions, almonds and raisins

yemeni_roti.title: Yemeni Roti
yemeni_roti.description: Made from a mixture or flour, milk, vanilla and eggs

rashoosh_bread.title: Rashoosh Bread
rashoosh_bread.description: Consists of a mixture of flour with butter and black seeds
